description: User processes job decision, creates pros/cons artifact, edits it, reflects on it later

turns.user_says: I've been offered a new job and I'm torn about whether to take it

expected_behavior.response: acknowledge significant decision, ask about the opportunity

turns.user_says: It's a VP role at a startup, more money but way more stress. My current job is stable but boring.

expected_behavior.response: reflect back the tradeoff, explore what matters most
expected_behavior.notes_should_capture: VP startup offer, higher pay, more stress vs stable but boring current job

turns.user_says: Can we make a pros and cons list for this?

expected_behavior.response: agree to create comparison, confirm what to include

turns.user_says: Add 'better learning opportunities' to the pros
Actually the stress thing is a big deal because of the kids. They need me present.

cons_modify.text: More stress - impacts family time with kids

expected_behavior.notes_should_capture: kids are priority, presence matters to user

turns.user_says: What were the main pros again?

expected_behavior.response: list back the pros from the artifact

cons.text: More stress - impacts family time with kids
